name: Premium Dog Food
description: Nutritionally balanced food for adult dogs with real chicken and vegetables. Supports healthy digestion and shiny coat.

name: Interactive Cat Toys
description: Keep your feline friend entertained for hours with this interactive laser toy. Encourages exercise and mental stimulation.

name: Professional Grooming Kit
description: Complete grooming set including brush, shampoo, and nail clippers. Everything you need to keep your pet looking their best.

name: Luxury Pet Bed
description: Memory foam bed provides superior comfort and support for your dog. Removable cover is machine washable.

name: Joint Health Supplements
description: Supports joint health and mobility for dogs of all ages and breeds. Contains glucosamine and chondroitin.

name: Organic Cat Food
description: High-protein, grain-free formula for indoor cats with sensitive stomachs. Made with organic ingredients.

name: Chew Toys Bundle
description: A variety of durable chew toys for dogs of all sizes. Helps clean teeth and satisfy natural chewing instincts.

name: Shedding Control Brush
description: Reduces shedding by up to 90% with its innovative design. Gentle on skin but effective on loose fur.

name: Winter Pet Jacket
description: Keep your pet warm and stylish during winter months. Water-resistant and available in multiple sizes.

name: Dental Health Chews
description: Promotes dental health and fresh breath for your pet. Reduces plaque and tartar buildup naturally.

name: Grain-Free Puppy Food
description: Specially formulated for growing puppies with sensitive stomachs. Grain-free recipe with real salmon.

name: Interactive Puzzle Feeder
description: Stimulates your pet's mind during mealtime. Slows down eating and provides mental enrichment.
